page.title: 05Shopping Centres, SE Derby
page.content: The Allenton shopping centre is one of the largest suburban shopping centres in Derby with over sixty shops. It is built on a linear pattern with shops facing the Osmaston road. Most of the premises are converted houses although the supermarkets, hardware and some smaller shops have newly built premises. Food shops dominate the centre with Fine Fare and the Co-op taking up strong corner positions. A particular feature of this centre is the good selection of non-food shops including furniture, hardware,ladies clothes, optician and pet store. In recent years the character of the centre has changed with the increase in hot food take-away shops and the incursion of businesses such as solicitors, estate agents, insurance offices and building societies.
